channel.title: RuneScape WebPage v1 [lock please]
channel.description:
Well this is basicly the css and html code taken out of RuneScape source code and alot of stuff removed and edited
Very easily editable not much credits given to me and jagex for the webpage only a simple link and words at the very bottom
Demo: http://xtras.ulmb.com/home.html
Pictures [IMG]http://i438.photobucket.com/albums/qq110/Mason_013/g42t3.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i438.photobucket.com/albums/qq110/Mason_013/5h3tg3.jpg[/img]
Im not sure if i will go furthur with it, maybe if i get some responses about it i will. There are more information and help within the download. E.g. information about adding new images and information about adding it to your webhost
Thanks guys. [hr]
shit, sorry i forgot the link. Ill add it in a sec
okay sorry about that heres the link: http://uppit.com/v/OL04SKO5

item.title: RuneScape WebPage v1 [lock please]
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:20, topic:308422”]idc what they say. Im not easily broken down.

uh no? It actually took some time, its easy for you because you’ve had years of experience

Well practice on your own then, we don’t want your shit just because it took you a long time to make.

Let me know when you have a life okay?[/quote]You tell yourself that you’re not easily broken down, yet you lash back in defense as if you are. What are you proving but contradiction and more controversy. By the way, the “having a life” line is so overrated it has a negative value; in other words you look more like an idiot than the victim.

He literally means go learn something significant that could help improve you web skills. Perhaps w3schools?

Read full topic

item.description:

Releasing inexperienced work on an experience dominated forum is a master for disaster. Why would you consider it? Everything is raw criticism, and if you can’t handle it there’s no defending it.

MITB has no sympathy, they’ll tell you the truth if it kills you.

item.title: RuneScape WebPage v1 [lock please]
item.dc:creator: @imjohn10 imjohn10
item.description:
@imjohn10 wrote:

[quote=“Starting up …, post:9, topic:308422”][quote author=TabbyKiller link=topic=404869.msg2994434#msg2994434 date=1255480544]

Why can’t you idiots make your own websites? The RuneScape one isn’t that great.

Why cant you be nice for once?
I dont know much about html and stuff so be happy i didn’t post something even simpler like this http://xtras.ulmb.com/TOS.html
[/quote]I love how your using html and not PHP so it doesn’t even check for the cookie. Also, I don’t even have to type yes in the box. Mines well just delete the box all together.[/quote]

He could have some .htaccess setup, but I doubt it.

Read full topic

Because im not a idiot who posts something in the wrong section

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


[/quote]this isnt moparscape and because of this we do not expect one to post in the wrong section. therefore, posting in the correct section isnt something anybody should be thankful to you about

proceed to delete this thread, learn some web design, and come back[/quote]
